verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:11
verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:12
verses.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:13
verses.text: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:14
verses.text: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:15
verses.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:16
verses.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:17
verses.text: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:18
verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.
